title: A month or two ago, many people were saying this game was dead
body:
It happens all the time but this time the haters were proven DEAD wrong. URF, a card game, a TV series, an overwatch thing ( dont know what to call it) _etcetera, etcetera_. If you were one of those haters complaining about the state of the game, I hope you uninstalled cuz you dont deserve Riot at thier best.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
